turnover.name: Turnover
turnover.sql: select DATE_FORMAT(tbl_order.created_at,'{group_by_date}') as x, SUM(subtotal) as y from {prefix}sales_order tbl_order where tbl_order.created_at >= "{date_from}" and tbl_order.created_at <= "{date_to}" and tbl_order.store_id in ({store_ids}) group by DATE_FORMAT(tbl_order.created_at,'{group_by_date}') order by tbl_order.created_at

sales_per_store.name: Sales per store
sales_per_store.sql:
select concat(tbl_website.name, '
', tbl_store.name) as x, SUM(grand_total) as y from {prefix}sales_order tbl_order inner join {prefix}store tbl_store on (tbl_order.store_id = tbl_store.store_id) inner join {prefix}store_website tbl_website on (tbl_store.website_id = tbl_website.website_id) where tbl_order.created_at >= "{date_from}" and tbl_order.created_at <= "{date_to}" and tbl_order.store_id in ({store_ids}) and tbl_order.state in ("processing", "complete") group by tbl_store.store_id

invoiced_per_country.name: Total Invoiced per country
invoiced_per_country.sql: select country_id as x, country_id, sum(tbl_invoice.base_grand_total * tbl_order.base_to_global_rate) as y from {prefix}sales_invoice tbl_invoice inner join {prefix}sales_order tbl_order on (tbl_order.entity_id = tbl_invoice.order_id) inner join {prefix}sales_order_address tbl_address on (tbl_order.billing_address_id = tbl_address.entity_id) where tbl_invoice.created_at >= "{date_from}" and tbl_invoice.created_at <= "{date_to}" and tbl_order.store_id in ({store_ids}) group by country_id order by sum(tbl_invoice.base_grand_total) desc

major_sales.name: Major Sales
major_sales.sql: select entity_id, increment_id, created_at, concat(customer_firstname, " ", customer_lastname) as customer, FORMAT(grand_total, 2) as grand_total from {prefix}sales_order tbl_order where tbl_order.created_at >= "{date_from}" and tbl_order.created_at <= "{date_to}" and tbl_order.store_id in ({store_ids}) order by grand_total desc
